subject: Doping (Sports)
Football
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Marijuana
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The union approved new rules on substance abuse and performance-enhancing drugs. The league, however, said the proposed deal had “significant unresolved issues.”
snippet: The union approved new rules on substance abuse and performance-enhancing drugs. The league, however, said the proposed deal had “significant unresolved issues.”
